verses.verse: For Zion's sake <WH4616> <WH6726> will I not <WH3808> hold my peace, <WH2814> and for Jerusalem's sake <WH4616> <WH3389> I will not <WH3808> rest, <WH8252> until <WH5704> the righteousness <WH6664> thereof go forth <WH3318> as brightness, <WH5051> and the salvation <WH3444> thereof as a lamp <WH3940> that burneth. <WH1197>

And the Gentiles <WH1471> shall see <WH7200> thy righteousness, <WH6664> and all <WH3605> kings <WH4428> thy glory: <WH3519> and thou shalt be called <WH7121> by a new <WH2319> name, <WH8034> which <WH834> the mouth <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> shall name. <WH5344>
Thou shalt also be <WH1961> a crown <WH5850> of glory <WH8597> in the hand <WH3027> of the LORD, <WH3068> and a royal <WH4410> diadem <WH6797> in the hand <WH3709> of thy God. <WH430>

Thou shalt no <WH3808> more <WH5750> be termed <WH559> Forsaken; <WH5800> neither <WH3808> shall thy land <WH776> any more <WH5750> be termed <WH559> Desolate: <WH8077> but <WH3588> thou shalt be called <WH7121> Hephzibah, <WH2657> and thy land <WH776> Beulah: <WH1166> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> delighteth <WH2654> in thee, and thy land <WH776> shall be married. <WH1166>

For <WH3588> as a young man <WH970> marrieth <WH1166> a virgin, <WH1330> so shall thy sons <WH1121> marry <WH1166> thee: and as the bridegroom <WH2860> rejoiceth <WH4885> over <WH5921> the bride, <WH3618> so shall thy God <WH430> rejoice <WH7797> over <WH5921> thee.

I have set <WH6485> watchmen <WH8104> upon <WH5921> thy walls, <WH2346> O Jerusalem, <WH3389> which shall never <WH3808> <WH8548> hold their peace <WH2814> day <WH3117> nor night: <WH3915> ye that make mention <WH2142> of <WH853> the LORD, <WH3068> keep not silence, <WH408> <WH1824>
And give <WH5414> him no <WH408> rest, <WH1824> till <WH5704> he establish, <WH3559> and till <WH5704> he make <WH7760> <WH853> Jerusalem <WH3389> a praise <WH8416> in the earth. <WH776>

The LORD <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> by his right hand, <WH3225> and by the arm <WH2220> of his strength, <WH5797> Surely I will no <WH518> more <WH5750> give <WH5414> <WH853> thy corn <WH1715> to be meat <WH3978> for thine enemies; <WH341> and the sons <WH1121> of the stranger <WH5236> shall not <WH518> drink <WH8354> thy wine, <WH8492> for the which <WH834> thou hast labored: <WH3021>

But <WH3588> they that have gathered <WH622> it shall eat <WH398> it, and praise <WH1984> <WH853> the LORD; <WH3068> and they that have brought it together <WH6908> shall drink <WH8354> it in the courts <WH2691> of my holiness. <WH6944>

Go through, <WH5674> go through <WH5674> the gates; <WH8179> prepare <WH6437> ye the way <WH1870> of the people; <WH5971> cast up, <WH5549> cast up <WH5549> the highway; <WH4546> gather out <WH5619> the stones; <WH4480> <WH68> lift up <WH7311> a standard <WH5251> for <WH5921> the people. <WH5971>

Behold, <WH2009> the LORD <WH3068> hath proclaimed <WH8085> unto <WH413> the end <WH7097> of the world, <WH776> Say <WH559> ye to the daughter <WH1323> of Zion, <WH6726> Behold, <WH2009> thy salvation <WH3468> cometh; <WH935> behold, <WH2009> his reward <WH7939> is with <WH854> him, and his work <WH6468> before <WH6440> him.

And they shall call <WH7121> them, The holy <WH6944> people, <WH5971> The redeemed <WH1350> of the LORD: <WH3068> and thou shalt be called, <WH7121> Sought out, <WH1875> A city <WH5892> not <WH3808> forsaken. <WH5800>
